vlive.korean: 왜 진작 말하지 않았어? Why didn't you tell me? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 해피 엔딩 [가두리횟집] EP12
진작 말해주시지... You should have told me sooner... 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 벽과 벽 사이 [가두리횟집] EP07
vlive.english: You should have told me sooner...

vlive.korean: 된다! 진작 이렇게 할걸! It's working! I should have done this earlier! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [1년 전 오늘의 CHUNG HA] 또박또박 심장을 꿍꿍 치고 지나간다.. 똠..얌..꿍..💓 (CHUNG HA pronouncing Tom Yum Kung a year ago)
vlive.english: It's working! I should have done this earlier!

vlive.korean: 이게 더 잘 나오네 - 진작 이렇게 할 걸! It looks better. - We should've done this early! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 콩디와 뀨디에게 물어봐!!
vlive.english: It looks better. - We should've done this early!

vlive.korean: 두성 쓰는 거 있냐고, 진작 얘기했어야지 - 두성 쓰는 거 있냐고! How come you didn't tell me about using head voice. - How can you use head voice! 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 권정열 고영배의 십란한밤 #120 with 첸(CHEN) of 엑소(EXO)
vlive.english: How come you didn't tell me about using head voice. - How can you use head voice!

examples.korean: You should have told me so before. 발음듣기 네가 진작 내게 그렇게 말했어야 해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You should have told me so before. 발음

examples.korean: ‘She gave me the money.’ ‘About time too!’ 발음듣기 “그녀가 내게 그 돈을 줬어.” “진작 그랬어야지!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘She gave me the money.’ ‘About time too!’ 발음

examples.korean: The Democrats held a pep rally on Capitol Hill yesterday. 발음듣기 민주당 의원들이 어제 의회에서 사기 진작 모임을 가졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Democrats held a pep rally on Capitol Hill yesterday. 발음

examples.korean: To help boost employee morale, I'd like to propose the following. 발음듣기 직원들의 사기를 진작시키는 데 일조하기 위해, 다음과 같이 제안합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: To help boost employee morale, I'd like to propose the following. 발음

examples.korean: I'm a great believer that any tool that enhances communication has profound effects in terms of how people can learn from each other, and how they can achieve the kind of freedoms that they're interested in. (Bill Gates) 발음듣기 나는 의사 소통을 진작시키는 모든 도구가 사람들이 서로 배우는 방식, 누리고자 하는 자유를 얻어내는 방식에 지대한 영향을 미친다고 굳게 믿는다. (빌 게이츠, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I'm a great believer that any tool that enhances communication has profound effects in terms of how people can learn from each other, and how they can achieve the kind of freedoms that they're interested in. (Bill Gates) 발음
